userStories.name: List customers with pagination
userStories.description: As a garage staff member, I want to view a paginated list of customers so that I can find and manage customer records efficiently.
acceptanceCriteria: Given I am on the customers list, When I open the first page, Then I see up to 20 customers with Id, Name, and Contact details.
Given there are more than 20 customers, When I request the next page, Then I receive the next set of customers.
Given a valid pagination request, When the API is called, Then a paginated response is returned.

userStories.name: Create customer
userStories.description: As a garage staff member, I want to create a customer record so that customer information can be stored and reused.
acceptanceCriteria: Given valid customer data, When I submit the request, Then a new customer record is created.
Given required fields are missing, When I submit the request, Then validation errors are returned.

userStories.name: Register vehicle
userStories.description: As a garage staff member, I want to register a vehicle for a customer so that service history can be tracked.
acceptanceCriteria: Given a valid customer exists, When I add a vehicle, Then the vehicle is linked to the customer.
Given duplicate registration numbers, When I add a vehicle, Then the API prevents duplication.

userStories.name: Create work order
userStories.description: As a garage staff member, I want to create a work order so that vehicle service work can be tracked.
acceptanceCriteria: Given a valid customer and vehicle, When I create a work order, Then the work order is created with status 'Created'.
Given service tasks are provided, When the work order is created, Then tasks are linked to the work order.

userStories.name: Assign mechanic to work order
userStories.description: As a garage manager, I want to assign mechanics to a work order so that responsibility is clearly defined.
acceptanceCriteria: Given a work order exists, When I assign a mechanic, Then the mechanic is linked to the work order.
Given the mechanic is already assigned, When I assign again, Then duplication is prevented.

userStories.name: Update work order status
userStories.description: As a garage staff member, I want to update work order status so that progress can be tracked.
acceptanceCriteria: Given work has started, When status is updated, Then it changes to 'InProgress'.
Given all tasks are completed, When status is updated, Then it changes to 'Completed'.
Given work order is not completed, When marking as Delivered, Then the API blocks the action.

userStories.name: Manage job tasks
userStories.description: As a mechanic, I want to manage job tasks so that individual services can be tracked.
acceptanceCriteria: Given a work order exists, When I add a task, Then it is linked to the work order.
Given a task is completed, When I update it, Then its status becomes 'Completed'.

userStories.name: Track mechanic labor hours
userStories.description: As a garage manager, I want to track mechanic labor hours so that labor costs can be calculated.
acceptanceCriteria: Given a mechanic is assigned, When hours are recorded, Then they are saved against the work order.
Given invalid hours, When submitted, Then validation errors are returned.

userStories.name: Manage spare parts inventory
userStories.description: As a garage manager, I want to manage spare parts inventory so that stock levels are accurate.
acceptanceCriteria: Given new stock arrives, When it is added, Then inventory quantity increases.
Given parts are used, When stock is updated, Then inventory quantity decreases.

userStories.name: Generate invoice
userStories.description: As a garage staff member, I want to generate an invoice so that customers can be billed.
acceptanceCriteria: Given a completed work order, When I generate an invoice, Then labor and parts are included.
Given taxes apply, When invoice is generated, Then taxes are calculated correctly.

userStories.name: Record payment
userStories.description: As a cashier, I want to record customer payments so that invoice status is updated.
acceptanceCriteria: Given a valid invoice, When payment is recorded, Then payment status is updated.
Given partial payment, When recorded, Then remaining balance is shown.

userStories.name: Manage employees
userStories.description: As a garage owner, I want to manage employees so that staff information is maintained.
acceptanceCriteria: Given valid employee data, When I create an employee, Then the record is saved.
Given inactive employees, When disabled, Then they cannot be assigned to work orders.

userStories.name: View reports dashboard
userStories.description: As a garage owner, I want to view reports so that I can monitor business performance.
acceptanceCriteria: Given completed jobs exist, When I view reports, Then revenue data is displayed.
Given date filters are applied, When reports are generated, Then filtered results are shown.
